PARAM.name: resolve-via-default
PARAM.help: Enables default route based nexthop resolution

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configures default route based IPv6 nexthop resolution within default VRF.
DOCGEN.USAGE: Use this command to enable default route based IPv6 nexthop resolution within default VRF.
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic-cli(config)# ipv6 nht resolve-via-default

PARAM.name: resolve-via-default
PARAM.help: Disables default route based nexthop resolution

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Unconfigures default route based IPv6 nexthop resolution in default VRF.
DOCGEN.USAGE: Use this command to disable default route based IPv6 nexthop resolution within default VRF.

EXAMPLE.summary: IPv6 nexthop tracking nht command examples

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic-cli(config)# no ipv6 nht resolve-via-default

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configure DHCPv6 relay on an interface.
DOCGEN.USAGE: Use this command to configure a DHCPv6 relay on an interface.
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic-cli(config)# interface Ethernet 12 sonic-cli(conf-if-Ethernet0)# ipv6 dhcp-relay 9000::1

DOCGEN.USAGE: Use this command to configure the source-interface.
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic-cli(config)# interface Ethernet 12 sonic-cli(conf-if-Ethernet0)# ipv6 dhcp-relay source-interface Ethernet36

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configure the VRF selection option.

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic-cli(config)# interface Ethernet 12 sonic-cli(conf-if-Ethernet0)# ipv6 dhcp-relay vrf-select

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic-cli(config)# interface Ethernet 12 sonic-cli(conf-if-Ethernet0)# ipv6 dhcp-relay source-interface Ethernet36

COMMAND.name: ipv6 dhcp-relay max-hop-count
COMMAND.help: Set max hop count for DHCPv6 Relay packets

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configure the maximum hop count for the DHCPv6 packet.
DOCGEN.USAGE: Use this command to configure the maximum hop count for the DHCPv6 packet.

EXAMPLE.summary: Configure dhcpv6 relay max hop count

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic-cli(config)# interface Ethernet 12 sonic-cli(conf-if-Ethernet0)# ipv6 dhcp-relay max-hop-count 9

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configure the VRF selection option.
DOCGEN.USAGE: Use this command to configure the VRF selection option.
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic-cli(config)# interface Ethernet 12 sonic-cli(conf-if-Ethernet0)# ipv6 dhcp-relay vrf-select

COMMAND.name: no ipv6 dhcp-relay
COMMAND.help: Unconfigure DHCPv6 relay on an interface

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Unconfigure DHCPv6 relay on an interface.
DOCGEN.USAGE: Use this command to unconfigure a DHCPv6 relay on an interface.
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic-cli(config)# interface Ethernet 12 sonic-cli(conf-if-Ethernet0)# no ipv6 dhcp-relay 9000::1 sonic-cli(conf-if-Ethernet0)# no ipv6 dhcp-relay

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Unconfigure the source IPv6 address to be used for relaying the DHCPv6 packets.
DOCGEN.USAGE: Use this command to Unconfigure the source-interface.
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic-cli(config)# interface Ethernet 12 sonic-cli(conf-if-Ethernet0)# no ipv6 dhcp-relay source-interface

COMMAND.name: no ipv6 dhcp-relay max-hop-count
COMMAND.help: Set default max hop count for DHCPv6 Relay packets

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Unconfigure the maximum hop count for the DHCPv6 packet.
DOCGEN.USAGE: Use this command to Unconfigure the maximum hop count for the DHCPv6 packet.

EXAMPLE.summary: Unconfigure dhcpv6 relay max hop count

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic-cli(config)# interface Ethernet 12 sonic-cli(conf-if-Ethernet0)# no ipv6 dhcp-relay max-hop-count

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Unconfigure the VRF selection option.
DOCGEN.USAGE: Use this command to Unconfigure the VRF selection option.
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic-cli(config)# interface Ethernet 12 sonic-cli(conf-if-Ethernet0)# no ipv6 dhcp-relay vrf-select

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configure static ND.
DOCGEN.USAGE: Use this command to configure static ND.
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic-cli(config)# interface Ethernet 0 sonic-cli(conf-if-Ethernet0)# ipv6 neighbor ip_addr mac

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Unconfigure static ND.
DOCGEN.USAGE: Use this command to unconfigure static ND.
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic-cli(config)# interface Ethernet 0 sonic-cli(conf-if-Ethernet0)# no ipv6 neighbor ip_addr mac
